ABOUTUS.p1: NOX by Ktheeb Is a company specialized in creating entertainment, established in 2017 Specialized in creating concepts and building complete entertainment.
ABOUTUS.p2: Through a short period of time the company made an outstanding model in transportable entertainment throughout the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
ABOUTUS.p3: Since 2017 and until this day the company has grown along-side its employees with their capabilities and the creativity spread throughout the department,creating exceptional entertainment contents.
